title: Seahawks fullback Derrick Coleman arrested
text:
Seahawks fullback Derrick Coleman arrested Bellevue police arrested Seahawks fullback Derrick Coleman on investigation of vehicular assault and hit and run. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Seahawks fullback Derrick Coleman arrested KING 5 News 12:20 p.m. EDT October 15, 2015 Seattle Seahawks fullback Derrick Coleman (40) looks on during a game against the San Diego Chargers during the second half at CenturyLink Field. The Seahawks beat Chargers 41-14. (Photo: James Snook-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Bellevue police arrested Seahawks fullback Derrick Coleman on investigation of vehicular assault and hit and run. He was booked into King County Jail at 1:20 a.m. on Thursday. 
Coleman has been with the Seahawks since 2013. He has two starts for Seattle this year. 
He missed 11 games in 2014 after suffering a broken foot during warmups in the game against the St. Louis Rams. 
Coleman is the first legally deaf offensive player in the NFL. He uses hearings aids and reads Russell Wilson's lips to know what's happeneing on the field. Read or Share this story: http://on.wtsp.com/1LvPvNr TOP VIDEOS
